one_reviews_text: Very good app so far the best vr sculpting tool. Easy to use and yet pro. I'm a 3D artist and i use it in my workflow. The problem is that i use medium with quest 2 through link cable and since Meta is owner of quest all the rift link apps became laggy including Medium, that's a nightmare ! Please do something oculus team !!!!

review_title: Really good also tip for errors start up
one_reviews_text:
1. my experice so far
Its really fun, being able to create anything i want and to also play around like they are a kid's toy has really help me with stress
im going to see if i could take my creation and put the into other softwears so i could use the in games like VR chat but if i cant thats fine, i just like making things
my only problem is the controls are a little confusing even after the tutorial but im slowly getting use to them
2. Tip/help for people who are having start up errors
I use a Rift S, I havent had any problems when starting the game, I look into it and the program supports Rift and Rift S so if your using something different that my be the problem
(sorry for spelling mistakes i can't even spell my name right sometimes)
It says 'purchased' but then there is no download link. No info online of how this can be downloaded.
We have taken VR into ceramics! What an incredible app. We have 3D printed all sorts of options.

J'ai fait une oeuvre, et j'ai fait l'importation dans mon Home, et impossible d'ouvrir le home ! pourquoi ? Aidez-moi svp !

Mise à jour! Je réinstalle toute oculus sur PC, Home load avec une erreur rapide mais j'y reviens directe, ma sculpture est là et impossible de supprimer l'inventaire!

 Je fais un nouvel essai avec une nouvelle oeuvre, J'ai une erreur au démarrage de home, comme une icône d'image cassée qui disparaît très rapidement pendant le load de home! 2e projet, je fais l'importation en haute définition pour Home encore, l'application plante et ne garde pas une sauvegarde automatique des dernières modifications!

 Je quite l'application, heureusement mon projet et dans home, mais les effets d'éclairage qui donnait des reflets et des textures à mon oeuvre n'existent plus dans Home, alors mon oeuvre n'a pas les détails voulus! 

Travailler sur cela car l'outil est vraiment génial pour créer des items personnalisés dans home!

 Ça serait tellement un plus de faire des options pour vente NFT avec code QR! 
Comme cela nous pourrions vendre des œuvres en ligne directement via la crypto monnaies

I mostly 3D model things to print with my 3D printer. Where Blender and other apps have a huge learning curve, Medium is easy to start on and get caught up playing with it for hours. Within the first hour of playing with this app, I was naturally zipping through the interface. Quick tip: Watch the tutorials, even if you don't think you need to. I got a few tips that were super useful from them.

i've spent a lot of time in this app. its a shame adobe wont update because its the BEST modeling app by far! to change lighting: pull down left thumb stick to open layer panel, >world > settings. to make a sculpt metalic: select the layer, and modify the layer setings. you can also increase resolution of sculpt to add fine details. Always export as FBX not OBJ or geometry will be distorted and FBX files are tiny vs massive OBJ files

I did that and it continues to crash... Overall impression, I bought the Quest for sculpting with Medium, and after a few days, over 450 dollars spent it still doesn't work. Very frustrating experience... If I ever manage to make it work I will probably change the rating, but for now it is clear 1 of 5 stars :/.

I don't see any improvement over the Oculus Medium, but I can say what is got worse here. Controllers work unstable, fly away from time to time, especially when they are closer to the helmet.
Strange, but this is not a problem in the Oculus Medium.
It would be nice to add functionality:
- Pinch tool
- Real Clay Tool (that not just draw in space, but sculpts the surface, as in the Z-brush)
- Ability to export individual layers
- Retopology. Ability to set the direction of the grid. Probably something like Zsphere
I already use this app in professional workflows, it has a lot of potential, but many things need to be improved.

every time i try to start the program up it gives me an error about fail to initialize the rendering and all my drivers are upto date and i know my  pc can handle this program in its sleep so i am at a loss.

review_title: Need ASAP update for VRDesktop mode
one_reviews_text: The app is incredible! I love it! However - an update for wireless use through Virtual Desktop would be gold! Quest / Quest 2 users would appreciate it ;)

First of all, I'm not a fan of voxel sculpting softaware and this might be the part of my problem, but this software is so underwhelming. First of all, brushes feel SO CLUNKY. Especially move tool.I can't get even a fraction of precision I can get in zbrush with my cheap huion tablet.
 Also lighting, it awful. It's dim and flat, and I don't know what kind of black magic it is, but I can better see form in zbrush on my flat screen than inside a VR headset. I got it, developers didn't want to implement matcaps for some reason. But give the surface at least basic shading! It's flat, 100% non-reflective with slight hints of shadows. 
 This program is still free and it's basic functional works, even though I don't like it. You probably can get used to it. And interface isn't complicated at all. So, two stars.
easy to work but we need more function tool to make detail of sculpture

review_title: Crashes on startup after update; no help
one_reviews_text: I've been using Oculus Medium for 3 months without any issues. A week ago the app crashes almost instantly on start up. I've tried all the fixes on different forums...nothing worked. Then I realized there's no way to get support now for this software: I posted on Oculus and Adobe Substance. No one responded. I feel like this app is now in a limbo and left to die.

There's so much you can do in this program, it's become my concepting and initial sculpt workhorse. You can just move and navigate around so easily. You want to play around a bit with the lighting and default colour of a clay, and then it's good to go. It all just feels intuitive and flows, much more than other sculpting and modelling apps at least.
Great free software from adobe.
This is a life changing app
Good with Quest 2 / Virtual Desktop / SteamVR. If you have triggers pressure issue disable triggers button in SteamVR controlls.

Fantastic app. 

Imagine using Zbrush in VR but being able to grab your sculpt with on hand and use your other to detail, paint and more. 

Have been using this for a few days and the fact that this is free blows my mind. 
Everything about this app is amazing and when using on oculous you have the added bonus of being able to present your sculpts in your link home. 

Stunning. 

However the missing stars are because i would love to have a couple more tools and fetures. 

Please please please add the following ( devs ) to every one else reading this these are currently not avalable tools. 

- Material views - customisation. 
currently there is one set type of material, you cant ajust the specularity, opacity, ect. this would be a small addition but would make the biggest diffrance. 

- Hardsurface modeling - Vert manipulation. 
Having the ability to play with things on an even lower level before stepping up to higher levels or event haveing a anchor manipulation would be amazing. aditionally more primitaves to use as stamps ect would be super useful. 
( however you can create your own burshes to do this but that is alot of preperation work ) 

- Masking 
Such a basic feture that can not be understated when it comes to painting or event hardening an edge, having the ability to mask a section to then work on another area that may be contigious is such a powerful adition to a toolkit that not having it feels debilitating. but again with this being a free app i cant grumble too much. 

- Flatten Brush to folow surfaces or the brush. 
The flatten brus works at the angle being initialy aimed at if this could work with the surface this would alow hard surface modeling withch again would be a HUGE step and open up alot more to the community. 

Honestly if these things were added i dont think i would use any other program as this would just be better in every way. 

Regardless love the app and would recomend.

It's not brimming with features, there are significant limitations. Generally speaking, you won't be producing high quality models in this without fighting an uphill battle.

But once you've figured out the nuances of handling its tools, it's a lot of fun and you can really pump out ideas FAST. It's GREAT for first draft models, or just fun personal/hobby work.

I hope Adobe haven't bought this package so that they can just forget about it - because I'd really love to see these kind of tools mature in the future.
but i have no idea where to find the pictures i take in the app lmao.
Please add this feature so we can make stuff like glass, and allow things to glow, otherwise good game/tool !
In short, I like everything.There is not enough display of the level of detail at which I am, it is difficult to orient myself on the squares sometimes. Everything is super, thank you!

review_title: Soooo good app but slower on Quest 2
one_reviews_text: I may have to keep my really old Oculus CV1 just to use Medium which is not really nice at my point of view. With the same gamer PC ... I still don't feel at all the 90 hertz or a satisfying FPS. It feels like 30 fps 50 hz max with link compared to a real good 90 with CV1 . We want precision on Medium and for the eye , I'm quickly tired of the ... slow FPS impression while working. Not famous for Quest 2 but really good app for CV1 and Oculus S which are discontinued soon.... so not sure at all I'd recommend that for Quest 2 . Hope improvements will be done.

Medium is an extremely powerful piece of software that makes sculpting extremely intuitive. Great controls, feels natural, and overall probably the best art-related program in VR. (Not to mention it's free.) A lot of the one star reviews are related to an Oculus Link bug that was recently patched but everything works flawlessly now.

review_title: Now works well with Quest Link
one_reviews_text:
This is a powerful and intuitive piece of software that I can see myself getting a lot of use out of. But there's one major issue for anyone using Oculus Link, myself included. The head tracking is out of sync somehow, which causes the entire environment to wobble around. It's still usable, but will make you nauseous very quickly. I'm hoping this will be fixed soon, and when it is, I will definitely change my review to 5 stars.

October update: I just discovered that the Link bug is fixed. Thank you! This app is awesome. If you're artistic at all, get this.

I'm working professionally for cover arts, movies and video games with medium since its beginning.
It's easily one of the very best software out there to model and sculpt, and really easy to use.
It's accessible for both beginners and seasoned 3d sculptors. Don't hesitate trying it!

The ability to import 3D models, modify them with the freedom of VR, and re-export as a 3D model feels like magic. 

With Link working as expected, I was able to use this for my latest project and it was a blast!

Update: The app works correctly again. Thanks Adobe! Now, can you please add retopology?

This is truly an incredible sculpting alternative. They've partnered with the Substance team responsible for bringing us Substance Painter and are really planning some next level sculpting alternatives. So many incredible artist are already creating next level sculpts using this program in its infancy. Checkout Gio Nakpil... He's truly the god of VR sculpting. I noticed in a short time that my sculpting improved drastically in VR. You have to plan your sculpting and having the ability to pull in several reference images and float them around you, is just next level. I really recommend this application. Currently using the Quest with Oculus Link has a weird stuttering bug, so I run the application using the REVIVE launcher instead. Revive is a desktop application that uses Steam VR. Works perfectly that way for me. Take the time to master the tools and resolution. This will hook you once you level up in skill.

Really great app I use it for work all the time!..It just needs a hotkey menu for frequently used controls.  It would also be great if the menus could stay open while sculpting.  Hopefully you guys see this message and try to innovate on these features!

review_title: tracking is totaly off on Quest
one_reviews_text: so the 1st time i used this app it worked well *till it crashed in atutoral so calld it there for the day* the next day i went on it the app was incapible of tracking my head movements correctly (on Oculas Quest+link) and iv tryed it sevral times since and the tracking is always off but about 1 to 1/2 seconds with my head movements this is the only app iv been getting this issue with its a shame as i liked what i saw the 1st time. hopeing this can be resolved via a Update.

I have used medium for about three years - every time I sculpt or design, I am swept away into a virtual studio where I’m free.. The medium team are warm to the community and so is the community to each other. The sheer scale of creative professionals that share and connect is awe inspiring. I have watched medium transform people’s creative lives.

I could be mistaken, but I'm pretty sure it works better since the jump. I don't have the beefiest computer so I'm used to working within the limits of Medium in the past, and now I think I can push a little further without crashing the machine. Funny enough, I turned the sounds off for so long that when the sounds came back I got a little bit nostalgia for the time I first used Medium already-years ago. It's better than ever, and the new feature where you get to import other sculpts into each other is something I did not realize I was waiting for for such a long time. I'm a character artist, so being able to join my previously divided cast of weird sculptures together in scenes is A+!!! I feel endlessly thankful that this works for me and I get to do it. Thank you so much to the hard working team, and congratulations on the smooth transition that apparently nobody had to be nervous about. You aced it, as far as I'm concerned! :) - TwistedWELL

Medium itself was a great modelling tool, but the new edition by Adobe won't start and instead gives me an error message about not having the latest GPU drivers. 

I DO have the latest drivers. 

Leaving this here till Adobe creates a better way for contacting them regarding the problem.

This works well for me having an Oculus Rift but I remembered there was a bunch of other features in the old version. I thought there was a community section that seems to have disappeared. Also there are only a few tutorials the rest seem to be gone.

This tool is amazing. Very simple to use and can make great things very quickly. I wasn't expecting it to be that much fun to be honest, but it's awesome.

The only issue I had was that the game refused to boot at first. I didn't even get an error message. I could keep pressing start and nothing would happen. I had to spend over an hour and try a bunch of diagnostics and looking through the logs to find the problem.

Here's my fix for those that have the same issue. I ran the program (Medium.exe) from the command prompt (cmd), only then i received the error message that prevented the program from starting. For me, I was missing the file "Vulkan-1.dll". You can find and download this library online. Once I installed it, it worked perfectly. And even with this issue, I still give 5 stars because it's a really amazing product.

e app is very powerful, you can create in a very short time good pieces for paint over or rendering for previz.
I hope they will update in the future with better improvement and features.

review_title: Please add ability to work with curves
one_reviews_text: Geometry freezing is such an awesome feature, finally I can do complex art inside of Medium now without exporting piece by piece to other software
